plot: In this futuristic tale, a drug-like substance is developed that enables a user to experience hallucinatory, completely sensory sexual experiences by being implanted directly into the brain.
title: Dark Garden
plot_es: In this futuristic tale, a drug-like substance is developed that enables a user to experience hallucinatory, completely sensory sexual experiences by being implanted directly into the brain.
plot_en: In this futuristic tale, a drug-like substance is developed that enables a user to experience hallucinatory, completely sensory sexual experiences by being implanted directly into the brain.
